subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Following a tough loss to the Bucks on Friday, the Knicks shift their attention to Sunday’s game against the Celtics, the swaggering defending champions with a 17-game winning streak.
snippet: Following a tough loss to the Bucks on Friday, the Knicks shift their attention to Sunday’s game against the Celtics, the swaggering defending champions with a 17-game winning streak.
